A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After viewing this movie I have no further interest in the story of Rey\, Finn\, Poe\, Kylo. I don’t care what happens to those posers and the continuation of their story. This is without a doubt a cash grab to push out the old OT characters and push on us\, these uninspired new wanna-bees. The plot was laughable\, the treatment of the OT heroes was despicable\, and it just didn’t feel like a Star Wars movie. I never felt so disappointed after watching a starwars movie.
